Uses of Interface
org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.PersistentObjectListener

  • Packages that use PersistentObjectListener 
    Package Description
    org.dellroad.stuff.pobj
    Simple XML Persistence Objects (POBJ).
    org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.distrib
    Classes that facilitate synchronizing a PersistentObject database across multiple nodes.
    org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.vaadin8
    Classes that facilitate connecting Vaadin 8.x to PersistentObjects.

    • Uses of PersistentObjectListener in org.dellroad.stuff.pobj

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractConfiguredBean<ROOT,T>
      Support superclass for Spring beans that are configured by a PersistentObject root object, or some portion thereof.
      Methods in org.dellroad.stuff.pobj with parameters of type PersistentObjectListener 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PersistentObject.addListener(PersistentObjectListener<T> listener)
      Add a listener to be notified each time the object graph changes.
      void PersistentObject.removeListener(PersistentObjectListener<T> listener)
      Remove a listener added via addListener().
